oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Joseph Scott Store
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Edwin Best
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greenback (Tenn.); Business;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard showing five adults and children, and a dog, on the porch facing the camera. Sign advertising staple and fancy groceries. Doors and windows on the first floor. Shuttered windows on second story. Clapboard siding on the second story exterior wall. Diagonal siding on the first floor exterior wall. Debris on ground.
